title: Responsible persons
context: [ยง328-122] Responsible persons. Wholesale distributors shall establish and maintain current lists of officers, directors, managers, and other persons in charge of the wholesale distribution, storage, and handling of prescription drugs, including a description of each person&rsquo;s duties and a summary of each person&rsquo;s qualifications. [L 1992, c 196, pt of ยง2]
